amendment.description: Amendment authorizes $35 million for construction of a convocation and community center in Youngstown, Ohio.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 106-562 to authorize $35 million special purpose CDBG funds for site acquisition, planning, architectural design and construction of a convocation and community center in Youngstown, Ohio.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 201 (Roll no. 108).
